page.title: Gala Electronues Widgets
page.content:
Demo EM Slideshow Widget

{{widget type="slideshowwidget/create" text1="Slide 1" url1="#" image1="slide1.png" text2="Slide 2" url2="#" image2="slide2.png" text3="Slide 3" url3="#" image3="slide3.png" effect="random" slices="15" boxcols="8" boxrows="4" animspeed="500" pausetime="5000" directionnav="true" controlnav="true" controlnavthumbs="false" pauseonhover="true" prevtext="Prev" nexttext="Next" randomstart="true"}}

 

Demo EM Featured Products Widget

Grid View

{{widget type="dynamicproducts/dynamicproducts" order_by="name asc" featured_choose="em_featured" limit_count="10" item_width="400" item_spacing="30" thumbnail_width="400" thumbnail_height="400" show_product_name="true" show_thumbnail="true" alt_img="thumbnail" show_description="true" show_price="true" show_reviews="true" show_addtocart="true" show_addto="true" show_label="true" choose_template="em_featured_products/featured_grid.phtml"}}

Grid View with column count = 3

{{widget type="dynamicproducts/dynamicproducts" order_by="name asc" featured_choose="em_featured" limit_count="10" column_count="3" item_width="150" item_spacing="30" thumbnail_width="150" thumbnail_height="150" show_product_name="true" show_thumbnail="true" alt_img="thumbnail" show_description="true" show_price="true" show_reviews="true" show_addtocart="true" show_addto="true" show_label="true" choose_template="em_featured_products/featured_grid.phtml"}}

 

 

List View

{{widget type="dynamicproducts/dynamicproducts" order_by="name asc" featured_choose="em_featured" limit_count="10" thumbnail_width="150" thumbnail_height="150" show_product_name="true" show_thumbnail="true" alt_img="thumbnail" show_description="true" show_price="true" show_reviews="true" show_addtocart="true" show_addto="true" show_label="true" choose_template="em_featured_products/featured_list.phtml"}}

List View with column count = 2

{{widget type="dynamicproducts/dynamicproducts" order_by="name asc" featured_choose="em_featured" limit_count="10" column_count="2" thumbnail_width="150" thumbnail_height="150" show_product_name="true" show_thumbnail="true" alt_img="thumbnail" show_description="true" show_price="true" show_reviews="true" show_addtocart="true" show_addto="true" show_label="true" choose_template="em_featured_products/featured_list.phtml"}}

 

 

Demo EM Bestseller Products Widget

Grid View

{{widget type="bestsellerproducts/list" limit_count="10" column_count="4" frontend_title="Bestseller Products" item_width="250" item_height="400" item_spacing="30" thumbnail_width="250" thumbnail_height="250" show_product_name="true" show_thumbnail="true" alt_img="thumbnail" show_description="true" show_price="true" show_reviews="true" show_addtocart="true" show_addto="true" show_label="true" choose_template="em_bestseller_products/bestseller_grid.phtml"}}

List View

{{widget type="bestsellerproducts/list" order_by="name asc" limit_count="10" frontend_title="Bestseller Products" thumbnail_width="150" thumbnail_height="150" show_product_name="true" show_thumbnail="true" alt_img="thumbnail" show_description="true" show_price="true" show_reviews="true" show_addtocart="true" show_addto="true" show_label="true" choose_template="em_bestseller_products/bestseller_list.phtml" column_count="4"}}

 

 

 

 Demo EM New Products Widget

Grid View

{{widget type="newproducts/list" limit_count="10" order_by="name asc" frontend_title="Bestseller Products" item_width="250" item_spacing="30" thumbnail_width="250" thumbnail_height="250" show_product_name="true" show_thumbnail="true" alt_img="thumbnail" show_description="true" show_price="true" show_reviews="true" show_addtocart="true" show_addto="true" show_label="true" choose_template="em_new_products/new_grid.phtml" column_count="4"}}

List View

{{widget type="newproducts/list" order_by="name asc" limit_count="10" frontend_title="Bestseller Products" thumbnail_width="150" thumbnail_height="150" show_product_name="true" show_thumbnail="true" alt_img="thumbnail" show_description="true" show_price="true" show_reviews="true" show_addtocart="true" show_addto="true" show_label="true" choose_template="em_new_products/new_list.phtml" column_count="4"}}

Grid View

{{widget type="saleproducts/list" limit_count="10" order_by="name asc" frontend_title="Bestseller Products" item_width="250" item_height="400" item_spacing="30" thumbnail_width="250" thumbnail_height="250" show_product_name="true" show_thumbnail="true" alt_img="thumbnail" show_description="true" show_price="true" show_reviews="true" show_addtocart="true" show_addto="true" show_label="true" choose_template="em_sale_products/sale_grid.phtml" column_count="4"}}

Horizontal Sliding
